page.title: 20The Domesday Surveyors.
page.content: Crofton J.& I. School helped with some of the amenity count. The rest of the survey work was carried out by staff and children at Sharlston J. & I. School. Mr. Heaton took photographs on our behalf. Text was written by: 1. Mr. J. Berry. 2. Jayne Beach. 3. Kevin Ward. 4. Deborah Wilson. 5. Claire Easterby. 6. Anthony Strutt. 7. Joanne Parrish. 8. Sharon Oakley, Tammy Loxton,Deborah Greenhalgh 9. Janine Hall, Sarah Hobbs. 10.Lindsey Clarke, Alison Hampson. 11.Lisa Scott, Lyndsay Harris. 12.Elizabeth Evans. 13.Steven Mullaney 14.Jayne Exley, Vicky Beecher. 15.Robert Radcliffe, John Shaw. 16.Andrew Skidmore. 17.Rachel Boulton. 18.Lee Chalkley 19.Donna Sharp. 20.Mr. J. Berry.
